import React, { useState } from 'react' import logo from '../trello.png' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' function NavBar(props) { const [searchBar, setSearchBar] = useState(false) const click = () => { setSearchBar(!searchBar) props.searchState(!searchBar) } const closeSearch = () => { setSearchBar(!searchBar) props.searchState(!searchBar) } return (
Home
Boards
Search
New Board
notif
Signin
) } NavBar.propTypes = { openModal: PropTypes.func.isRequired, onSearchChange: PropTypes.func, searchState: PropTypes.bool } export default NavBar
